Title: multiSearchFirstPositionCaseInsensitiveUTF8
Description: Like multiSearchFirstPosition but assumes haystack and needle to be UTF-8 strings and ignores case.
haystack — UTF-8 string in which the search is performed. String.needle — Array of UTF-8 substrings to be searched. Array
Leftmost offset in a haystack string which matches any of multiple needle strings, ignoring case.0, if there was no match.
